document.full_text: the israeli military deployed the first mobile battery of a new missile defense system on the outskirts of beersheba after a week of heightened tensions between israel and gaza.
document.title: israel rolls out first mobile battery of antirocket system
lines_and_colors: the israeli military deployed the first mobile battery of a new missile defense system on the outskirts of beersheba after a week of heightened tensions between israel and gaza.
